verses.text: Ix tak'wi winhaj Job chi' icha tik:
Tato smasanil in yaelal yet' in cusk'olal tik, tz'echtaj t'a yol junok echlab',
tecan ek'to yalil t'a yichanh yarenail sti' ha' mar, yuj chi' ix in comon alej icha tik.
Ha Dios Syal Yuj Smasanil, ichato ix och ch'apnaj sjul-lab' t'ayin, haxo swenenoal spucax t'a in niwanil. Toxo ix oymaj tas ay smay t'ayin yuj.
¿Tocwal tz'ok' nok' caltacte'al b'uru tato ay yanh nok'? ¿Tocwal tz'ok' nok' mam wacax tato ay tas sk'ux nok'?
¿Mach schi'an junok chib'il wail tato malaj yatz'amil? ¿Tocwal wach' sloji saquil nok' nholob' tato malaj yatz'amil?
Icha chib'il wail malaj yatz'amil, icha chi' tas tzin chi ticnaik swab'i. Manhxalaj in gana in wa'i.
Comonoc tz'el t'a sk'ol Dios yak'an tas tzin k'an t'ay. Comonoc syak' tas tzin nib'ej.
Comonoc tz'el t'a sk'ol Dios chi' in sataneli, yic tzin lajwiel t'a junelnhej.
Wach'chom swab' syail yuj in yaelal yet' in cusk'olal tik, palta tzin te tzalaji, yujto swak'nhej och sley Dios yipoc in k'ool, aton Dios Axonhej Ochi.
Manhxalaj wip swab'i yic swak'an techaj in yaelal tik, ¿tasxom yuj comon pitzan into?
¿Tocwal lajan stzatzil in niwanil tik icha k'een k'een? ¿Tocwal icha stzatzil k'een bronce stzatzil in b'ak'chil?
Maxtzac yal in colan in b'ha t'a yol wico'. Manhxa junok mach skolwaj wed'oc.
Ha junok mach ayoch t'a syaelal, wach'chom manhxa yelk'och Dios Syal Yuj Smasanil t'ay, palta smoj wal tz'ak'ji sniwanil sk'ol yuj heb' swach'k'ool.
Palta a ex tik ex wamigo, tonhej ix in he wach' juejeli. Lajan ex icha junok ha' eluma' stup t'a smelemal.
Ayic syak'an nhab' tat tz'aj sat ha' sb'eyi calan ha' yet' k'een cheev, ma yet' k'een sacb'acom.
Ayic tz'ulax k'een cheev chi', stupem ha' eluma' chi', haxo yic tzowaj k'ak' stacjiem ha'.
Ha heb' anima b'eyum, sb'at heb' t'a titac b'e yic sayan ha' heb' yuk'ej, haxo tz'aji, satcanb'at heb' t'a lum taquinh lu'um chi', ata' schamcan heb'.
Ha heb' b'eyum anima aj chonhab' Temán yet' heb' aj Sabá, say ha ha' heb' yojtactaxon b'aj scani,
haxo yic sk'och heb' b'aj aytaxon ha' chi', taquinhxo yet'tal ha', toxonhej staccank'e sk'ol heb'.
Icha chi' eyaj t'ayin a ex tik, yujto ayic tzeyilanoch jantac in yaelal tik, tonhej tzex xivk'ei.
Palta a in tik, malaj tas tzin k'an t'ayex. Malaj tumin tzin k'an t'ayex yic tzin colchaji.
¿Tocwal tzin k'an he colwal yic tzin colchaj t'a yol sk'ab' jun ajk'ol t'ayin, ma t'a juntzanh heb' elk'um?
Hak'ek in k'ayb'ub'al, ol in cha wab' t'ayex. Ch'oxec och in mul chi' t'a in sat.
Malaj junok mach spaticanel junok pensar to wach', palta a ex tik, manhxa stzolal tas tzeyak'och t'a wib'anh.
Ha ex tik nab'anhej tzin he tumej, palta eyojtac to a slolonel junok mach ayoch t'a syaelal, ay b'aj malaj jab'oc yelk'ochi.
Ha ex tik, syal eyak'an he suerte t'a yib'anh heb' meb'a' ob'iltac. Syalpax he chonhanel junok eyamigo.
Ochanhec k'elan t'a in sat, tato tonhej swesej.
Actejec eyalan juntzanh chi' t'a in patic. Comonoc tzeyojtaquejeli to yel juntzanh swal tik.
Ha he naani to esalwum in. Ha he naani to manh wojtacoc tas yel yet' tas manh yeloc.
